name: Wave Portal
description: Solidity Web3-based project where users can exchange ETH using MetaMask Walleton the Rinkeby network and send greetings.

name: Study Kanji
description: Designed for those looking to learn Japanese in a simple and user friendly way. Understanding the Kanji is a very basic stepping stone as an introduction to the language

name: Point of Sale
description: Designed for those looking to learn Japanese in a simple and user friendly way. Understanding the Kanji is a very basic stepping stone as an introduction to the language

name: Weather Dashboard
description: Incorporates Weather API- current weather, 5-day forecast, UV Index, and icon database. User can search for a city, and recieve up to date weather information. Website saves the users previous searches to easily revisit the weather conditions of previously searched cities

name: Pizza Cutter
description: Restaurant Administrative Dashboard built for Pizza Cutter, Michigan since 1975. This appliction allows restaurant managers ability to easily edit the content of their website.

name: Budget Tracker
description: Progressive Web Application with offline functionality that provides users a quick tool to manage and view both deposits, and expenses.

name: Employee Tracker
description: This is a React application that serves as quick-access employee directory wherein you can view basic employee details, and sort alphabetically by first name.

name: Employee Badge Maker
description: C# application, using the Random User Generator API as placeholder, and can gather and save employee data using CLI, and consequently creates a workplace badge with the employee's picture, employee name, company name, and employee id number.
